text:
June 20, 1957
Dr. Burton Paulu
Station K U 0 M
One Eddy Hall
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis, Minnesota
Dear Burton:
Thanks for sending along Schenkkan’3 letter re¬
garding membership. It’s worth thinking about, and
doing about If I or someone can come up with good idea.
For those who know I think the Newsletter and Journal
in themselves are worth the price of admission, .“/here
else can anyone find out about what*8 going on. More
Important, there should be an Interest of the profes¬
sional in the professional. But no matter what it
ought to be, how can we improve the situation. Maybe
we’ll have bright idea someday.
Surprised Jerry Willsea didn’t mention all this to
me because he and I have corresponded on memberships,
and I spent all of one late evening and early morning
with him.
Regards,
Frank E. Schooley
FES:nb
CC: Schenkkan
